likes.empty: When someone likes one of your videos, you'll see it here

comments.empty: When someone comments on one of your videos, you'll see it here

mentionsAndTags.empty: When someone mentions you, you'll see it here

follower.empty: When someone follows you, you'll see it here

notificationContent: We’ll update our Community Guidelines on September 13, 2025, so you can continue to create, explore, and share safely on TikTok. Check out what’s new and learn more.
